mapper.select: SELECT BA.*, IFNULL(BAD.BAD_COUNT,0) BAD_COUNT, BAD.BAD_ID, CONCAT(BSF.SF_PATH,'@@@',BSF.SF_NAME) IMG_PATH_BTN FROM BUS_ACHIEVEMENT BA LEFT JOIN (SELECT BA_ID,COUNT(1) BAD_COUNT,MAX(ID) BAD_ID FROM BUS_ACHIEVEMENT_DETAIL WHERE BW_ID = #{ID} GROUP BY BA_ID)BAD ON BAD.BA_ID = BA.ID LEFT JOIN SYS_FILE BSF ON BSF.SF_TABLE_NAME = 'BUS_ACHIEVEMENT' AND BSF.SF_TABLE_ID = BA.ID AND BSF.SF_SDI_CODE = 0 WHERE BA.IS_STATUS = 1

SELECT BA.*, IFNULL(BAD.BAD_COUNT,0) BAD_COUNT, CONCAT(SF.SF_PATH,'@@@',SF.SF_NAME) IMG_PATH, CONCAT(SFI.SF_PATH,'@@@',SFI.SF_NAME) IMG_PATH_IN FROM BUS_ACHIEVEMENT BA LEFT JOIN (SELECT BA_ID,COUNT(1) BAD_COUNT FROM BUS_ACHIEVEMENT_DETAIL WHERE BW_ID = #{ID} GROUP BY BA_ID)BAD ON BAD.BA_ID = BA.ID LEFT JOIN SYS_FILE SF ON SF.SF_TABLE_NAME = 'BUS_ACHIEVEMENT' AND SF.SF_TABLE_ID = BA.ID AND SF.SF_SDI_CODE = 1 LEFT JOIN SYS_FILE SFI ON SFI.SF_TABLE_NAME = 'BUS_ACHIEVEMENT' AND SFI.SF_TABLE_ID = BA.ID AND SFI.SF_SDI_CODE = 2 WHERE BA.IS_STATUS = 1 ORDER BY BAD.BAD_COUNT DESC,BA.BA_ENTRYTIME ASC

SELECT CONCAT(SF.SF_PATH,'@@@',SF.SF_NAME) IMG_PATH, CONCAT(SFI.SF_PATH,'@@@',SFI.SF_NAME) IMG_PATH_IN FROM SYS_DICT_INFO SDI INNER JOIN SYS_FILE SF ON SF.SF_SDT_CODE = 'BUS_ACHIEVEMENT_END' AND SF.SF_TABLE_ID = '1' AND SF.SF_SDI_CODE = 1 INNER JOIN SYS_FILE SFI ON SFI.SF_SDT_CODE = 'BUS_ACHIEVEMENT_END' AND SFI.SF_TABLE_ID = '1' AND SFI.SF_SDI_CODE = 2 WHERE SDI.SDT_CODE = 'BUS_ACHIEVEMENT_END' AND SF.SF_TABLE_ID = '1' GROUP BY CONCAT(SF.SF_PATH,'@@@',SF.SF_NAME),CONCAT(SFI.SF_PATH,'@@@',SFI.SF_NAME)
